solutions.title: Record to Report
solutions.body: Finance and accounting mgt process which involves collecting, processing and delivery in relevant timely information used for providing strategic, financial and operational feedback.

solutions.title: Plan to Produce
solutions.body: The business process involved in taking a product from pre-market introduction to on the shelf.  Forecasting, sales operations planning, production planning, procurement, manufacturing.

solutions.title: Lead to Cash
solutions.body: The lead-to-cash process is for managing all aspects of the customer experience, from the initial customer interaction to order fulfillment and service delivery. It focuses on driving and realizing revenue along the customer journey.

solutions.title: Total Workforce Management
solutions.body: SAP has streamlined processes, enabled by the SAP Intelligent Enterprise Framework, to manage all aspects of your workforce (employees and external workers) in line with business objectives and with clear financial impact.

solutions.title: Acquire to Retire
solutions.body: Managing the lifecycle of an asset.  Usually a physical asset and generally a piece of equipment, large machine, engine, powerplant.  Procure, build, asset library, maintenance, depreciation, service, replacement parts.

solutions.title: Design to Operate
solutions.body: The classical manufacturing process, starting from Design, over the manufacturing and delivery of an asset, and in the Intelligent Enterprise process cut also the step of finally Operating the asset at customer site is included.

solutions.title: Source to Pay
solutions.body: From strategically selecting the right suppliers or external workforce personnel to assuring compliance demands related to operational procurement processes are executed.

solutions.title: Information to Insight
solutions.body: Information-to-insight process ranges from managing data storage, governance, and performance to real-time business insights with a digital boardroom.

solutions.title: Message to Market
solutions.body: The process is about understanding and reaching target audiences, aligning messaging to company goals, and ascertaining the differentiating values and benefits of products.
